description:
## Reference Registration

Register a published work that describes a model or model component.

References provide detailed documentation beyond what the EMD overview contains.

**All references MUST have a DOI.** If no DOI exists, obtain one via [Zenodo](https://zenodo.org) first.

label: Reference ID
description: Short identifier for this reference.\n\nFormat: ref-[authorYear] or ref-[descriptive-name]

label: Citation
description: Full bibliographic citation for the work.\n\nUse any standard bibliographic style.
placeholder: e.g., Smith, A. B., Jones, C. D., & Williams, E. F. (2024). Model description paper. Journal of Climate Modelling, 15, 123-145. https://doi.org/10.1234/example

label: DOI
description:
The DOI as a full URL.

**Must start with https://doi.org/**

If the reference has no DOI, obtain one via Zenodo before registering.

label: Applies To
description: What this reference describes (for tracking).\n\nExamples: CNRM-ESM2-1, NEMO v3.6, HadGEM3 family

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
